tns:patch.author: Octavian Ciubotaru
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_indicator_sectors AS SELECT con.activity_id AS amp_activity_id, s.name, ind.indicator_id AS amp_me_indicator_id FROM amp_indicator_connection con, amp_indicator ind, amp_sector_indicator si, amp_sector s WHERE ind.indicator_id = con.indicator_id AND ind.indicator_id=si.indicator_id AND si.amp_sector_id=s.amp_sector_id AND con.sub_clazz::text = 'a'::text;
